channel.title: Dracut Debain 12 Kicksecure Distromorph for ram-wipe
channel.description: Fresh install of debian 12 and Distromorphed to kicksecure, attempted to install dracut and it failed to boot. Just wanted to report it and see if there was a solution I want to install ram-wipe

item.title: Dracut Debain 12 Kicksecure Distromorph for ram-wipe
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
It was a general call for help. Not to mention you specifically.

Meaning, unless some contributor magically appears to look into this,

  • manages to reproduce this issue with Debian and reports it there,
  • diagnoses the technical root cause,
  • or even contributes a bug fix,

then it could be a very long time until this gets fixed.

Read full topic
item.source: Dracut Debain 12 Kicksecure Distromorph for ram-wipe
